TopicTitle: Mechjeb 2 fully working except for the Rover Autopilot???

Articles.Content: Mechjeb 2 fully working except for the Rover Autopilot, Have I installed it incorrectly or am I missing something for the Rover autopilot to work? Every other mode displays and works correctly but I just get a cross in the top right screen when I select Rover. Any help would be great.

I use bon voyage. It's not technically support but works for autopilot whole controlling other craft.

I can't recall MJ2 rover interface but seem to recall a speed lock. Same with plane where you can maintain current course.

 

GITHUB bug reports said to hold 'alt' when you select drive
